nl.reachability: ['NOT (NL_LIBRARIES AND NL_INCLUDE_DIRS)', '', 'NL3_INCLUDE_DIR', 'NL3_LIBRARY AND NLGENL_LIBRARY AND NLROUTE_LIBRARY']
nl.new_related_options: NL_LIBRARIES NL_INCLUDE_DIRS NL3_INCLUDE_DIR NL3_LIBRARY NLGENL_LIBRARY NLROUTE_LIBRARY
